articles.title: Live updates: Follow Kyle Larson’s attempt at Indy 500/Coca-Cola 600 ‘Double’ - NASCAR.com
articles.description: Follow along with live updates as Kyle Larson attempts the "double" by competing in the Indianapolis 500 and the Coca-Cola 600.
articles.content: The biggest day in racing is finally here, featuring NASCAR’s Coca-Cola 600 from Charlotte Motor Speedway, the Indianapolis 500 for IndyCar and the Monaco Grand Prix in F1, won earlier today by Lando… [+2525 chars]

articles.title: Is there a least harmful alcohol? 5 drinks ranked based on their alcohol content - Times of India
